name: Andrés López
shortDescription: Passionate software engineer with 2+ years of experience in developing scalable web applications and working with cutting-edge technologies.
longDescription: I am a dedicated Full Stack Software Engineer with a strong background in both front-end and back-end development. I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions and am always eager to learn and adopt new technologies. My expertise includes working with JavaScript, React, Node.js, and various other frameworks and tools. I am committed to writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
